metadata.name: From Morning to Midnight - The Bed
metadata.description:
What do you call it when things that should be precious are treated like dangerous waste? 

This image was directly inspired by the work of photographer Joshua Irwandi. Irwandi's image of a lost covid patient wrapped in plastic to protect the hospital staff from covid was central to developing this series of photos.

This series is an answer to isolation, exploring the dissolution of normalcy as Covid made waves through our society. It's inspired by the images of fear and dread in the German expressionist film movement; growing shadows, duplicity, finality, and inevitability.  

Image size 4096 X 1720  
Black Magic Pocket Cinema Camera  
From Morning to Midnight - single edition
